subject: XMLUnit and halting
msgSnippet: Hello, How do I make the tests not halt when there is an exception in the one of the asserts calls ( assertxpathexists) , but continue checking other paths?
messageBody:
Hello,

How do I make the tests not halt when there is an exception in the one
of the asserts calls ( assertxpathexists) , but continue checking other
paths?

Thanks
Indira.
